name: with-react-fullstack
description: > This JavaScript course was created by [Stephen Grider](https://github.com/StephenGrider) for Udemy.   > Sign up at [Node with React: Fullstack Web Development](https://www.udemy.com/course/node-with-react-fullstack-web-development/).

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix server/client && npm run build --prefix server/client
